title: Boris Johnson's Top Black Adviser Quits After 'Gaslighting' Study That Denied Institutional Racism Exists
content:
1. Boris Johnson's Top Black Adviser Quits After 'Gaslighting' Study That Denied Institutional Racism Exists  The Daily Beast
  2. Race report accused of 'downplaying racism'  Sky News
  3. British Government's 'Gaslighting' Report on Racism Says Slavery Had Some Upsides  The Daily Beast
  4. The Sewell report displays a basic misunderstanding of how racism works | Kalwant Bhopal  The Guardian
  5. Black lives do matter in Britain: this is not complacency, but common sense  TheArticle
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 鲍里斯-约翰逊的顶级黑人顾问在 "放气 "研究后辞职，该研究否认了制度性种族主义的存在。
鮑里斯-約翰遜的頂級黑人顧問在 "放氣 "研究後辭職，該研究否認了制度性種族主義的存在。
人種差別の存在を否定する研究を「ガスライティング」と称して行った結果、ジョンソンの黒人アドバイザーが辞職
